titles.title: Cybersecurity Curriculum Enhancement Act
Cybersecurity Curriculum Enhancement Act
Cybersecurity Curriculum Enhancement Act
To direct the Secretary of Education to award grants for cybersecurity curriculum for secondary schools, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Cybersecurity Curriculum Enhancement Act
This bill directs the Department of Education to award grants to states, local educational agencies, and nonprofit organizations for cybersecurity education curriculum for secondary schools.
